official_title: To validate and confirm a conveyance of certain real property by the Southern Pacific Transportation Company, successor in interest to Southern Pacific Railroad Company, to the Redevelopment Agency of the city of Tulare, a public body, corporate and politic, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Validates and confirms the conveyance of certain real property from the Southern Pacific Transportation Company, successor in interest to Southern Pacific Railroad Company, to the Redevelopment Agency, Tulare, California.

titles.title: To validate and confirm a conveyance of certain real property by the Southern Pacific Transportation Company, successor in interest to Southern Pacific Railroad Company, to the Redevelopment Agency of the city of Tulare, a public body, corporate and politic, and for other purposes.
